name: Combo Card Clashers
storyline:
Combo Card Clashers is a single player roguelike deckbuilder bringing a powerful unique combat system. Use strategy to choose cards and craft your combo grid to unlock powerful synergy.
Three heroes to choose, each has its own unique and surprising gameplay. Customize the attributes of each hero and craft their starting deck to maximize their potential.
Embark on a journey, recruiting monsters, mercenaries, discovering relics, and using strategy to win intense tactical fights.
Shape the outcome of your adventure! Recruit and hire potential allies to help and engage in intense battles.
Explore a skill tree to enhance your character's abilities, creating an exciting journey of progression and strategy.
Discover events, buy new cards, upgrade cards, weapons, and gear and make strategic decisions.
summary: Combo Card Clashers is an auto battler meets roguelike deckbuilder - Choose cards for your combo grid and play them all each turn! Build a balanced deck, craft powerful card combos, and use tactical decisions to unravel each hero's mystery while saving the world.
